basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Luke Cole, an engineer, developer and professional tinkerer. Starting from a background in Biomedical Engineering, I set off into the professional world to find something exciting and rewarding. That path took with to a contract manufacturing company where the challenges are numerous and complex, just like I like them. To better equip myself for new challenges, I've made my way through a full-stack web development bootcamp.

projects.title: Alottarhythms
projects.description: A-LOTTA-RHYTHMS is an online social platform where music enthusiasts can connect with each other and create music together. It is the first real full-stack application that I worked on with a team from the full-stack UCSD bootcamp

projects.title: Workout Tracker
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: Customizable Business Site
projects.description: One of the things I got tired of pretty quickly is updating my portfolio page, so I told myself that as soon as I had all the tools under my belt, I'd set up a plug-n-play site that would have an admin page to set all of the site information. I'm calling it a business site instead of a portfolio, because I want to include features for client interaction.

projects.title: Blog Site
projects.description: This is a full stack, ready-to-deploy, blog website. It is complete with a mysql database and a simple front end UI. The user can create an account, view posts, add posts, edit posts, and comment on posts. It is a great starting point to build off of if you want to build your own version of a blog website.

projects.title: Budget Tracker
projects.description: The Budget Tracker App allows you to track your income and expenses with a simple UI and a easy to understand chart. The app also functions offline and will load any offline transactions into the backend MongoDb when it comes back online.

projects.title: Inspiration Station
projects.description: A GitHub-pages web application that can create and curate collections of inspirational and humorous digital content. It was developed by a team of four prospective full-stack developers as part of a coding bootcamp assignment. This application pulls in text and images from various publically-available web APIs. Check it out to get good vibes on demand.

experience.title: Electromechanical Technician
technologies: Visual Basic for Excel, Access, Powerpoint, and Word
